divs: sighting detailshello again to every one,this is dr.ibrahim of www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org sending this urgent report from cairo after less than nine hours from my previous report sent today.this time it was different ufo seems in shape like fireball (please check the fotoef).the orbit was from southeast to southwest hedding towards steps pyramid of saqqara ,but in the begining in a lower altetude after that moving up and up till it was very hard to see after morning light braked-in.just like a single lonly far star.all of thease urgent notice and remarks was recorded in a video camera on one tape for period of fourty three minutes and twenty one secends.later will instale on our web site with more details.dr.ibrahim ------------------------------------------------------------------------- dear sirs, no time in this moment to add as just captured another ufo just hours ago. i will add extra details and informations when add updating my web site;-www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org. in this time i prefare to record the events ,as i am dealing only with hard evidence which recorded on video or at least fotoed ,in order to relay for any future analysis by your experts staff. with my best wishes to every one and regards from egypt. dr.ibrahim ufo researcher\investigator (independent)
